    • Uses of Constraint in de.mrapp.android.validation

      Methods in de.mrapp.android.validation that return Constraint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <Type> Constraint<Type> Constraints.conjunctive(Constraint<Type>... constraints)
      Creates and returns a constraint, which allows to combine multiple constraints in a conjunctive manner.
      static Constraint<java.lang.CharSequence> Constraints.containsLetter()
      Creates and returns a constraint, which allows to verify texts in order to check, if they contain at least one letter.
      static Constraint<java.lang.CharSequence> Constraints.containsNumber()
      Creates and returns a constraint, which allows to verify texts in order to check, if they contain at least one number.
      static Constraint<java.lang.CharSequence> Constraints.containsSymbol()
      Creates and returns a constraint, which allows to verify texts in order to check, if they contain at least one symbol.
      static <Type> Constraint<Type> Constraints.disjunctive(Constraint<Type>... constraints)
      Creates and returns a constraint, which allows to combine multiple constraints in a disjunctive manner.
      static Constraint<java.lang.CharSequence> Constraints.minLength(int minLength)
      Creates and returns a constraint, which allows to verify texts in order to check, if they have at least a specific length.
      static <Type> Constraint<Type> Constraints.negate(Constraint<Type> constraint)
      Creates and returns a constraint, which allows to negate the result of an other constraint.
      static Constraint<java.lang.CharSequence> Constraints.regex(java.util.regex.Pattern regex)
      Creates and returns a constraint, which allows to verify texts in order to check, if the match a certain regular expression.
      Methods in de.mrapp.android.validation that return types with arguments of type Constraint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Constraint<java.lang.CharSequence>> PasswordEditText.getConstraints()
      Returns a collection, which contains the constraints, which are used to verify the password strength.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ContainsLetterConstraint
      A constraint, which allows to verify texts in order to check, if they contain at least one letter.
      class  ContainsNumberConstraint
      A constraint, which allows to verify texts in order to check, if they contain at least one number.
      class  ContainsSymbolConstraint
      A constraint, which allows to verify texts in order to check, if they contain at least one symbol.
      class  MinLengthConstraint
      A constraint, which allows to verify texts in order to check, if they have at least a specific length.
      class  RegexConstraint
      A constraint, which allows to verify a text in order to check, if it matches a certain regular expression.
